import React, { useEffect, useState } from 'react' import { repayAmount } from "../../../contractTranscations/repayment" import ActivityIndicator from '../ActivityIndicator' import {collateralborrowPools} from './../../../query/pool/addCollateral' import dai from './images/dai.png' import compound from './images/compound.png' import './style.css' export default function BorrowDetailsModal({showModal, openModal, selectedPool}) { const [borrowAsset, setborrowAsset] = useState('dai') const [borrowAmount, setBorrowAmount] = useState('') const [requesting, setRequesting] = useState(false) const [error, setError] = useState('') const [success, setSuccess] = useState('') const [pooldata, setpooldata] = useState([]) const icon = dai; const icon2 = compound; useEffect(() => { if (showModal) { setError('') setSuccess('') collateralborrowPools(selectedPool.address,setpooldata) } }, [showModal]); const onResponseCalback = (response) => { if (response.error) { setError(response.message) } else if (response.success) { setSuccess('You have repayed successfully.') } setRequesting(false) } const onPressRepay = () => { if (success) { setSuccess('') openModal() } else { if (borrowAmount) { setError('') setSuccess('') setRequesting(true) repayAmount( borrowAmount, selectedPool.address, pooldata.borrowAsset.address, onResponseCalback ) } } } return ( {showModal ?
Repay

700.34 DOT

Amount
Repay All: 700.34
setBorrowAmount(e.target.value)} value={borrowAmount} />

*/}

{success}
{requesting ? : success ? 'OK' : 'Repay'}
:null} ) }
